column5: As mentioned earlier, Harry plays the position of Seeker on the Gryffindore house quiddditcg team
column6: The three different types of balls used in Quidditch include the Golden Snitch (which is worth extra points and difficult for Seekers to catch), the Quaffles (bouncy balls which Chaser teams attempt to score goals on) and Bludger(either red or blue depending on team allegiance)-like objects which Beater squadrons hit towards opposing players during matches.

column8: In J. R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings trilogy, Gandalf played a crucial role in helping Frodo and Sam on their journey towards Mordor where they had to destroy the One Ring. He provided them with advice, guidance, and support throughout their ordeal.

column11: In standard play, seven players from each side compete on a Quidditch pitch at once (four Chasers,two Beaters andone Keeper). However, during special events or exhibition matches, more players may participate.
column12: There are seven hundred ways of committing a Quidditch foul according to "Quidditch Through The Ages".
